attributes.action: Use British English instead of American English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the increase in government on media spin and marketing more politicians and civil servants are making use of American English pronunciation to sound 'up-to-date' and 'cool'.  Patent, data and patriotic are prime examples of this and it is eroding a sense of Britishness.  If it is ok for politicians then the general public will surely think the same.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
